      • build

        public static <T> javafx.scene.control.TableView build(java.util.List<T> objects,
                                                       java.lang.Class<T> clazz,
                                                       boolean sortable,
                                                       TableCallback<T> eventHandler)
        Convert a list of type T into a table
        Type Parameters:
        T - standard POJO
        Parameters:
        objects - list of objects
        clazz - the type of the objects
        sortable - true if the table's columns should be sortable
        eventHandler - if set, an Action column with a button will be added. Clicking the button will invoke the callback with the object passed in.
        Returns:
        a table view containing the objects

        Parameters:

        clazz - the class to be read
